review: Great product and price. Best streamer on the market,
author: Blake

review: awesome kids can now take to their room to watch movies on TV they don't have cable in rooms.
author: d romanofski

review: Amazon fire TV stick is great thanks Amazon
author: Reuben E. Davis

review: Very easy to use and install.  It isn't clear from the description that you do need power for this item, so be sure you have an open power plug in your entertainment power strip.  Set up was easy and straightforward and pretty intuitive.  Access to Amazon Prime programming was very easy.  Quite happy with this so far.  I wouldn't say the same for the iPhone App for controlling the TV Stick.  It is much less intuitive than just using the remote that comes with it.  That's why this gets four rather than five stars.
author: COS "COS"

review: Quick and easy setup. Works great.
author: garrett

review: Great product! I plugged it in and it knew my name and already was set up. All I had to do was type in my wifi password and I was streaming Netflix and Amazon Prime
author: Robert S. Stockdale

review: This was easy to install.  I wish there were more movies and shows available.
author: j

review: Between the Fire Stick and digital TV antenna, we were able to cut the cable TV cord and save hundreds of dollars a year.  We have no problems whatsoever watching NetFlix, Amazon Prime, or Hulu with the Fire Stick and if we want to watch live TV, we just switch to our digital antenna that receives 12 crystal clear digital channels in our area.
author: Charles D. Jones, Jr.
